alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Knott; Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 8:18PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF PERRY...KNOTT... HARLAN...AND LETCHER COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 817 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was nearly stationary along a line extending from Fisty to near Lynch and moving slolwy southeast at around 5 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Cumberland, Lynch, Benham, Big Black Mountain, Lewis Creek, Maggard, Partridge, Rock House, Blair and Clutts around 825 PM EST. Brinkley around 940 PM EST. Letcher, Bath, Blackey, Smithsboro, Carr Creek, Cody, Dirk, Littcarr, Redfox and Spider around 945 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
